name: Brand Guidelines Notion Template
description: This comprehensive Brand Guideline template provides a centralized platform to store and organize all your brand assets, colors, typography, logos, and voice & tone guidelines in one place. It covers brand strategy, brand design and I've added in my Canva Brand Guidelines template as a bonus too! Whether you're a startup or an established company, this template will help you maintain consistency across all your marketing materials and ensure a cohesive brand image. Say goodbye to cluttered f
